subject: Re: FW: FW: Flock - Evidence.com integration
body:
You don't often get email from support@flocksafety.com. Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hi there,
Happy to take a look! I see an image mentioned, but I don't see it in this thread. Can you please send me a screenshot of the permissions that you included in your API and the error screen in Flock? 
 
To see the permissions in the API, you can hover over the permissions part of the API listing in your Axon interface. 
 
I look forward to assisting you further. 
 
Stay safe,
Rhianna
 
--------------- Original Message ---------------
From: Emily Atzen [emily.atzen@flocksafety.com]
Sent: 4/17/2025, 8:21 AM
To: support@flocksafety.com; ddewitt@eugene-or.gov
Subject: Re: FW: FW: Flock - Evidence.com integration


Hello,  
 
I so apologize for missing you message on Tuesday and thank you for following up! I am looping in @Flock Safety Support support@flocksafety.com  here to take a further look. 
 
@Flock Safety Support support@flocksafety.com - OR Eugene is receiving the attached error message when trying to complete their Axon integration. Is this a known issue? Please advise! 
 
Thank you, 
Emily 

On Thu, Apr 17, 2025 at 8:14?AM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

	Good morning,

	 

	Just wanted to follow up with this and see if you had an idea of why we are getting this error.

	
	Derek

	 

	Detective D. DeWitt

	Financial Crimes Unit

	Special Weapons and Tactics Team

	Background Investigations Team

	Eugene Police Department

	300 County Club Road

	Eugene, OR 97401

	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

	Work Cell � 541-743-6192

	 

	From: DEWITT Derek A 
	Sent: Tuesday, April 15, 2025 2:07 PM
	To: Emily Atzen <emily.atzen@flocksafety.com emily.atzen@flocksafety.com >
	Subject: RE: FW: Flock - Evidence.com integration

	 

	Our IT guy tried to supply the login information needed for the Axon integration and received this error message.  Can you assist further.

	
	Derek

	 

	Detective D. DeWitt

	Financial Crimes Unit

	Special Weapons and Tactics Team

	Background Investigations Team

	Eugene Police Department

	300 County Club Road

	Eugene, OR 97401

	Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

	Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

	Work Cell � 541-743-6192

	 

	From: Emily Atzen <emily.atzen@flocksafety.com emily.atzen@flocksafety.com > 
	Sent: Thursday, April 10, 2025 2:22 PM
	To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
	Subject: Re: FW: Flock - Evidence.com integration

	 

	[EXTERNAL ?]

	Hello Derek,  

	 

	Thanks for sending this over! You need to log into Flock, go to Admin > Integrations > + Add New Integration > Axon. 

	 

	From there, you can fill in the needed information to integrate the APIs. Does this make sense? Let me know if you have any questions!

	 

	On Thu, Apr 10, 2025 at 2:18?PM DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > wrote:

		See the response below from our IT department regarding the axon integration.

		
		Derek

		 

		Detective D. DeWitt

		Financial Crimes Unit

		Special Weapons and Tactics Team

		Background Investigations Team

		Eugene Police Department

		300 County Club Road

		Eugene, OR 97401

		Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

		Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

		Work Cell � 541-743-6192



		From: SHANNON Travis S <TShannon@eugene-or.gov TShannon@eugene-or.gov > 
		Sent: Thursday, April 10, 2025 2:17 PM
		To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >
		Subject: RE: Flock - Evidence.com integration

		 

		Yes, these are API settings that I can create.

		 

		I will need to know the proper permissions Flock needs. Here�s an example of the things I can enable:



		 

		Travis Shannon
		Sr. Application Support Technician
		Eugene Police Department

		300 Country Club Road

		Eugene, Oregon 97401
		(541)-682-5806



		From: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > 
		Sent: Thursday, April 10, 2025 14:14
		To: SHANNON Travis S <TShannon@eugene-or.gov TShannon@eugene-or.gov >
		Subject: Flock - Evidence.com integration

		 

		Travis,

		 

		When we get ready to link Evidence.com to Flock.  This is the information that we need to make it happen.  Do you have this available?

		 

		Derek

		 

		Detective D. DeWitt

		Financial Crimes Unit

		Special Weapons and Tactics Team

		Background Investigations Team

		Eugene Police Department

		300 County Club Road

		Eugene, OR 97401

		Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.

		Desk Phone � 541-682-2682

		Work Cell � 541-743-6192



	
	

	 

	-- 

 

Emily Atzen
Regional Customer Success Manager I



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 
 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com 

	
 

	

 

 

	 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/eGdYJ1PPRrN.png> 

 
 
-- 



Emily Atzen
Regional Customer Success Manager I



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 
 <https://cdn.gifo.wisestamp.com/s/rfw4/108062/26/trans.png>  flocksafety.com 

	
 

	
 	 
 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/eGdYJ1PPRrN.png>
